es.csic.iiia.nsm.strategy.iron

Class IRONOperators

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.csic.iiia.nsm.strategy.iron.IRONOperators

  • public class IRONOperators
extends java.lang.Object
    The operators that the IRON strategy uses to perform norm synthesis. Specifically, IRON uses operators create, add, activate, deactivate, generalise and specialise
    Author:
    "Javier Morales (jmorales@iiia.csic.es)"

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate(Norm norm)
      Activates a norm (i.e., sets its state to active in the normative network
      void add(Norm norm)
      Adds a norm to the normative network and activates it by means of method activate(Norm)
      void create(Conflict conflict, Goal goal)
      Uses a CBR-based norm generation machine to generate norms from a given given conflict.
      void deactivate(NormativeNetwork normativeNetwork, Norm norm)
      Deactivates a norm (i.e., sets its state to inactive in the normative network
      void generalise(NormativeNetwork normativeNetwork, Norm parent, java.util.List<Norm> children)
      Generalises a List of children norms to a parent.
      void specialise(NormativeNetwork normativeNetwork, Norm norm, java.util.List<Norm> children)
      Specialises a given norm into its children.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create(Conflict conflict,
                   Goal goal)
        Uses a CBR-based norm generation machine to generate norms from a given given conflict. Generated norms are aimed to avoid the conflict in the future. Finally, it adds the generated norms to the NormativeNetwork
        Parameters:
        conflict - the conflict to avoid in the future by means of norms
        goal - the goal in which terms the conflict was detected

      • add

        public void add(Norm norm)
        Adds a norm to the normative network and activates it by means of method activate(Norm)
        Parameters:
        norm - the norm to add to the normative network
        See Also:
        NormativeNetwork

      • activate

        public void activate(Norm norm)
        Activates a norm (i.e., sets its state to active in the normative network
        Parameters:
        norm - the norm to activate in the normative network
        See Also:
        NormativeNetwork

      • deactivate

        public void deactivate(NormativeNetwork normativeNetwork,
                       Norm norm)
        Deactivates a norm (i.e., sets its state to inactive in the normative network
        Parameters:
        norm - the norm to deactivate in the normative network
        See Also:
        NormativeNetwork

      • generalise

        public void generalise(NormativeNetwork normativeNetwork,
                       Norm parent,
                       java.util.List<Norm> children)
        Generalises a List of children norms to a parent. With this aim, it: (1) adds generalisation relationships from each child to the parent in the normative network; (2) activates the parent norm; and (3) deactivates the children
        Parameters:
        normativeNetwork - the normative network
        parent - the parent norm
        children - the List of child norms
        See Also:
        NormativeNetwork

      • specialise

        public void specialise(NormativeNetwork normativeNetwork,
                       Norm norm,
                       java.util.List<Norm> children)
        Specialises a given norm into its children. With this aim, it: (1) deactivates the norm; and (2) activates its children
        Parameters:
        normativeNetwork - the normative network
        norm - the norm to specialise
        children - the List of child norms
        See Also:
        NormativeNetwork
